:width.description: The width of the watermark, the default value of content is its own width
:width.description_zh: 水印的宽度，content 的默认值为自身的宽度

:height.description: The height of the watermark, the default value of content is its own height
:height.description_zh: 水印的高度，content 的默认值为自身的高度

inherit.description: Whether to transmit the watermark to pop-up components such as modal and drawer
inherit.description_zh: 是否将水印传导给弹出组件如 Modal、Drawer

:rotate.description: When the watermark is drawn, the angle of rotation in °
:rotate.description_zh: 水印绘制时，旋转的角度，单位 °

:zIndex.description: The z-index of the appended watermark element
:zIndex.description_zh: 追加的水印元素的 z-index

image.description: Image source, it is recommended to export 2x or 3x images, high priority (base64 format supported)
image.description_zh: 图片源，建议导出 2 倍或 3 倍图，优先级高 (支持 base64 格式)

:offset.description: The offset of the watermark from the top left corner of the container, which defaults to gap/2
:offset.description_zh: 水印距离容器左上角的偏移量，默认为 gap/2
